name: Defenders of Tetsoidea
description: Join Leira and Tens, as they end up in a fight against a world-destroying corporation intent on meddling with the natural order of things with disastrous results.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 297 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
